definition.title: Delete media package from the archive
definition.description: Delete a media packge from the archive on optianlly retract it from the engage distribution channel. WARNING! When retracting from the different publication channels is disabled, they can't be retracted anymore by the archive UI. Instead the REST endpoints have to be used!

definition.title: Encode, Analyze, and Distribute
definition.description:
A simple workflow that transcodes the media into distribution formats, then sends the resulting distribution files,
    along with their associated metadata, to the distribution channels.
definition.configuration_panel:
Holds Processing should be paused to allow for:
  •  Review / Trim before encoding (with option to edit info)
  •  Captions file upload
Archive
  •  Archive the media package
Publication
  •  Matterhorn Media Module
  •  Metadata Harvesting
